total_revenue.context: Up 2% year-over-year, despite having one less week in the quarter

performance_details.fx_impact: Negative impact of about 2 percentage points year-over-year

segments.name: iPhone
key_points: All-time revenue records in Europe and Rest of Asia-Pacific
All-time records in Malaysia, Mexico, The Philippines, Poland, Turkey
December quarter records in India, Indonesia, Saudi Arabia, Chile
Launched iPhone 15 lineup with glowing reviews and strong customer adoption
High customer satisfaction with 99% in the U.S.

iphone_15: Gorgeous new design with color-infused back glass and contoured edges
iphone_15_pro: Most advanced camera system with equivalent of seven pro lenses
Features like Emergency SoS and roadside assistance via satellite

segments.name: Services
key_points: All-time revenue records across advertising, cloud services, payment services, and video
December quarter records in App Store and AppleCare
Paid subscriptions growing double-digits year-over-year
Installed base surpassed 2.2 billion active devices
Double-digit growth represents an acceleration from the September quarter

new_content: Apple Music Super Bowl halftime show featuring Usher

highlights: Strong engagement with the new season

segments.name: Mac
key_points: Driven by the strength of latest M3-powered MacBook Pro models
Mac turns 40 years old
Introduction of M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max chips
Launch of latest generation of Apple silicon
Installed base at an all-time high with nearly half of Mac buyers being new to the product
97% customer satisfaction in the U.S.

new_products.macbook_pro: World's best pro notebook family with M3 chips
new_products.imac: iMac powered by M3 chips, faster and more capable

segments.name: iPad
key_points: Down 25% year-over-year due to difficult comparisons with previous launches and one less week of sales
Most versatile, capable, and elegant tablet on the market
Go-to device for students, creators, and more
Powerful apps like Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro for iPad
Installed base at an all-time high with over half of customers being new to the product
98% customer satisfaction in the U.S.

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories
key_points: Down 11% year-over-year due to challenging launch comparisons and one less week of sales
September quarter benefited from launches of AirPods Pro 2nd generation, Watch SE, and first Watch Ultra
Nearly two-thirds of Apple Watch purchasers were new to the product
96% customer satisfaction for Apple Watch in the U.S.
Introduction of carbon-neutral option for Apple Watch
New double tap gesture feature enhancing usability
Enhanced health and wellness tools
AirPods lineup remains a holiday favorite

drivers: Partially offset by foreign exchange impact
Partially offset by foreign exchange impact

services_gross_margin.context: Up 190 basis points from last quarter

expectations.revenue: Similar to last year's March quarter, adjusting for one less week and removing COVID-related factory shutdown impacts
expectations.foreign_exchange: Negative impact of about 2 percentage points year-over-year

vision_pro.description: Most advanced personal electronics device ever with groundbreaking new input system and thousands of innovations

software_updates: Future software releases to be detailed later this year

new_markets: Additional countries following U.S. launch of Apple Vision Pro
store_updates: Opened three new stores, including 100th store in Asia-Pacific
Demoing Apple Vision Pro for customers
Continued expansion during the holidays to assist customers with holiday shopping

key_programs: Partnerships with suppliers to bring more clean energy online for Apple production
Goal to become 100% carbon-neutral across all products by 2030

metadata.installed_base: Over 2.2 billion active devices across all products and geographic segments

challenges: Challenging year-over-year comparisons due to one less week and COVID-related factory shutdowns
